info.name: Google Cloud - Red Navbar when Prod (updated)
info.description: Turns the navbar of the Google Cloud Platform console red when the project ID contains the word "production", "prod", or "prd", to avoid mistakes.
info.additionalInfo: The original style was created by Yusak Tristanto Kurniawan. This was modified to work with the newest version of the Cloud Console and to support additional variants of production in the URL.
